items.title: Advanced Backend Programming with Java
items.organization: Mentorship by Ilkin Mehdiyev (Senior Software Engineer)
items.description: Selected through a highly competitive process for an exclusive, advanced-level backend engineering program. Under the direct mentorship of Senior Engineer Ilkin Mehdiyev, mastered industry-standard backend development using Java and Spring Boot. The curriculum emphasized production-grade API design, scalable architecture, and real-world software engineering practices. Recognized publicly as a standout participant within a select group of high-potential developers.

items.title: Advanced Computer Science Courses
items.description: Completed intensive Advanced Computer Science programs. In Phase I (at ADA University, supported by IDDA), ranked 5th out of 100+ participants. In Phase II (online), earned a Progress Certificate for consistent engagement and over 50% performance.

items.title: ABB Math Challenge
items.description: Selected as a winner of the ABB Math Challenge to participate in an intensive 10-day Olympiad Mathematics training program conducted by expert instructors from Russia. The program focused on advanced mathematical theories, followed by seminars and daily competitive assessments. Gained deep insights into complex problem-solving techniques and rigorous mathematical logic, contributing to a high-ranking performance in the final evaluations.

items.title: Oracle
items.description: Currently pursuing professional certification in MySQL through Oracle's academic path. Completed initial attempts for the MySQL Implementation Associate exam, scoring 54/100 (Passing Score: 60/100), and the MySQL 8.0 Database Administrator exam, scoring 20/100 (Passing Score: 62/100). Actively reinforcing technical expertise in database management and architecture in preparation for the upcoming retakes.

items.title: Testdome
items.description: Successfully earned a PHP certification from Testdome, demonstrating proficiency in back-end development and problem-solving. Achieved a ranking in the Top 25% of all test-takers, validating strong skills in server-side logic, data handling, and efficient coding practices.

items.title: HackerRank Certiffications
items.description: A collection of HackerRank Skill Certifications validating fundamental proficiency in software development. These credentials verify core competencies in Problem Solving (Data Structures and Algorithms), alongside technical mastery in Java, C#, and JavaScript. Each certification was earned by passing rigorous skill assessments designed to evaluate logical reasoning and language-specific best practices.

items.title: Turkcell
items.description: Completed a comprehensive web development curriculum through Turkcell’s 'Geleceği Yazanlar' initiative. Successfully mastered foundational and intermediate concepts across the Web Programming 101 and 201 series, covering the essential building blocks of modern web technologies, front-end architecture, and development workflows.
